entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
